entries.meaning: (meteorology) Relating to, or taking place during, a storm.
examples: If daily or stormwise total rainfall amounts are concerned these results are not directly applicable because in this case it is not possible to convert the time variation of daily rainfall to space variation.

adjectives.description: stormwise (comparative more stormwise, superlative most stormwise)

entries.meaning: (rare) Having knowledge and experience of storms.
examples: Almost a footnote really, the inscription nonetheless implies a historical standard, a reference to an earlier, and perhaps even more intense, hurricane that stormwise New Englanders still tell tales about.
